data: Il Ladro di Cardellini (The Finch Thief)

Nella campagna, Pasquale Cardinale, un ranger anziano, trascorre le sue giornate tra alcol e video poker. Per saldare i debiti organizza una truffa di 200 cardellini bianchi puri. (In the Campania countryside, Pasquale Cardinale, an elder ranger, spends his days between alcohol and video poker. To settle the debts he organizes a scam of 200 white pure goldfinches, replacing them with common ones, but it will not end as expected.)
Nella campagna, Pasquale Cardinale, un ranger anziano, trascorre le sue giornate tra alcol e video poker. Per saldare i debiti organizza una truffa di 200 cardellini bianchi puri.

In the Campania countryside, Pasquale Cardinale, an elder ranger, spends his days between alcohol and video poker. To settle the debts he organizes a scam of 200 white pure goldfinches, replacing them with common ones, but it will not end as expected.
